summaries.text: The theory that consciousness permeates reality is regaining traction.
Panpsychism, the idea that everything has consciousness, is resurging as science questions what matter really is.
The ancient view that consciousness is fundamental to reality is making a comeback as science reveals matter to be less concrete than we thought.

The radical idea that consciousness pervades the universe, long dismissed in mainstream Western thought, is experiencing a renaissance as new scientific discoveries challenge the prevailing view of matter as lifeless and mechanical.
